description:
As China's economy continues to crash, the situation for Chinese youth is getting bleak. Forget the lie flat movement. They're now pretending to be birds. 

Japan is in danger if China invades Taiwan. And so they came out with Final Fantasy 14 Dawntrail, which...encourages players to defend the island nation of Tural from a sinister evil...https://youtu.be/gzC1gpjwRiI

title: Why Are Chinese Youths Pretending to Be Birds?
